items.name: Spring Rolls
items.description: Fresh vegetables wrapped in rice paper, served with peanut sauce
items.detailedDescription: Our spring rolls are made fresh daily with a colorful mix of crisp vegetables. Each roll is carefully hand-wrapped in delicate rice paper and served with our house-made peanut sauce that adds the perfect balance of sweet and savory flavors.

items.name: Garlic Bread
items.description: Toasted artisan bread with garlic butter and fresh herbs
items.detailedDescription: Freshly baked artisan bread, slathered with our signature garlic butter blend and topped with fresh parsley. Toasted to golden perfection with a crispy exterior and soft, buttery interior.

items.name: Bruschetta
items.description: Grilled bread rubbed with garlic, topped with diced tomatoes, fresh basil, and olive oil
items.detailedDescription: Traditional Italian appetizer featuring toasted artisan bread rubbed with fresh garlic and topped with a vibrant mixture of ripe tomatoes, fragrant basil, and premium extra virgin olive oil.

items.name: Calamari Fritti
items.description: Crispy fried squid rings served with marinara sauce and lemon wedges
items.detailedDescription: Tender squid rings lightly coated in our seasoned flour blend and fried until golden. Served with house-made marinara sauce and fresh lemon wedges for the perfect combination of crispy and zesty flavors.

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Crisp romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, croutons, and classic Caesar dressing
items.detailedDescription: A timeless salad featuring fresh, crisp romaine lettuce tossed in our creamy house-made Caesar dressing. Topped with aged parmesan cheese and garlic-seasoned croutons for the perfect crunch.

items.name: French Onion Soup
items.description: Rich beef broth with caramelized onions, topped with crusty bread and melted Gruyère
items.detailedDescription: Our signature soup features slowly caramelized onions in a rich beef broth enhanced with a touch of cognac. Topped with toasted bread and bubbling Gruyère cheese for a comforting classic.

items.name: Mediterranean Salad
items.description: Mixed greens, feta cheese, olives, cucumber, tomatoes with balsamic vinaigrette
items.detailedDescription: A refreshing blend of crisp mixed greens, creamy feta cheese, Kalamata olives, and garden-fresh vegetables, dressed in our house-made balsamic vinaigrette with Mediterranean herbs.

items.name: Grilled Salmon
items.description: Fresh Atlantic salmon with herbs and lemon, served with roasted vegetables
items.detailedDescription: Premium Atlantic salmon fillet grilled to perfection and seasoned with fresh herbs and lemon. Accompanied by a medley of seasonal roasted vegetables and our signature herb-infused oil.

items.name: Filet Mignon
items.description: 8oz premium beef tenderloin, served with garlic mashed potatoes and seasonal vegetables
items.detailedDescription: Hand-cut premium beef tenderloin grilled to your preference, topped with herb butter. Served alongside creamy garlic mashed potatoes and perfectly seasoned seasonal vegetables.

items.name: Chicken Marsala
items.description: Pan-seared chicken breast in Marsala wine sauce with mushrooms and pasta
items.detailedDescription: Tender chicken breast pan-seared and smothered in a rich Marsala wine sauce with sautéed mushrooms. Served over al dente pasta with fresh herbs and parmesan.

items.name: Vegetable Risotto
items.description: Creamy Arborio rice with seasonal vegetables and parmesan cheese
items.detailedDescription: Slowly cooked Arborio rice in vegetable broth, finished with white wine and parmesan cheese. Studded with seasonal vegetables and fresh herbs for a luxurious vegetarian main course.

items.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
items.description: Classic Roman pasta with eggs, pecorino cheese, pancetta, and black pepper
items.detailedDescription: Traditional Roman pasta dish made with perfectly cooked spaghetti, tossed with a silky sauce of farm-fresh eggs, aged pecorino cheese, and crispy pancetta. Finished with freshly ground black pepper.

items.name: Fettuccine Alfredo
items.description: Fettuccine pasta in rich cream sauce with parmesan cheese
items.detailedDescription: Homemade fettuccine pasta tossed in our signature Alfredo sauce made with heavy cream, butter, and aged parmesan cheese. A classic comfort dish elevated with quality ingredients.

items.name: Tiramisu
items.description: Classic Italian dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream
items.detailedDescription: Layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and creamy mascarpone filling, dusted with premium cocoa powder. Our traditional recipe brings the authentic taste of Italy to your table.

items.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
items.description: Warm chocolate cake with molten center, served with vanilla ice cream
items.detailedDescription: Decadent chocolate cake with a rich, flowing chocolate center, served warm with premium vanilla ice cream and a light dusting of powdered sugar.

items.name: Crème Brûlée
items.description: Rich vanilla custard topped with caramelized sugar
items.detailedDescription: Silky smooth vanilla bean custard topped with a layer of caramelized sugar that cracks perfectly with each spoonful. Served with fresh seasonal berries.

items.name: Craft Coffee
items.detailedDescription: Premium coffee made from locally roasted, single-origin beans. Available as espresso, americano, cappuccino, or latte. Served with a house-made biscotti.

items.name: Fresh Fruit Smoothie
items.description: Blend of seasonal fruits with yogurt
items.detailedDescription: Refreshing smoothie made with a blend of seasonal fresh fruits and creamy yogurt. Choose from berry blast, tropical paradise, or green energy variations.

items.name: Italian Soda
items.description: Sparkling water with your choice of flavored syrup
items.detailedDescription: Refreshing combination of sparkling water and premium flavored syrups. Choose from raspberry, vanilla, hazelnut, or passion fruit. Topped with a touch of cream and fresh mint.
